products.title: Sevilla Tranquility  Black Vertical Blind
products.description: Here we have a black coloured blind, perfect for making a strong statement at the window. The sevilla blackout range has a high quality finish and offers superb light control. These blackout blinds are the ideal choice for any room in your home where you would like to keep the here we have a black coloured blind, perfect for making a strong statement at the window.

products.title: Black Pvc Blackout Vertical Blind
products.description: The alicante range of blackout vertical blinds is made from high quality pvc. These blinds are just perfect for bathrooms and a very popular choice for kitchens, they are totally waterproof and wipe clean with ease. The alicante blinds are almost indestructible making them a the alicante range of blackout vertical blinds is made from high quality pvc.

products.description: A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. This black vertical blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom as it is moisture resistant. products.title: Bella Blackout Black 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their bella blackout black vertical blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their bella blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout vertical blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first.

products.description: A luxurious, metallic finish fabric. Available in 6 stunning shades suitable for an array of different interior styles. We love this incredibly versitile black out fabric. products.title: Metz Pvc Blackout Black 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: The metz pvc blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from. Waterproof and flame retardant, metz fabrics are durable and practical. Vertical blinds offer optimal light and privacy control, so are a firm favourite in the uk, especially with overlooked houses and office. This understated black, marbled, black blackout vertical blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchensat swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new vertical blind is made by their expert team, in their yorkshire workshop, and comes with a free five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Origin (Blackout), Ebony - Vertical Blind
products.description: The origin (blackout) in ebony is the deepest, darkest black, which will make it a strong contender for attention in your room. Its blackout properties, manoeuvrable louvres, and smooth, high quality fabric just serve to add to the appeal of this sleek window covering. Accentuate lime green or orange shades in a teen's bedroom or your home office by settling the ebony amongst them to craft a monochromatic colour scheme with a colour-popping twist.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Black - Vertical Blind
products.description: In terms of home dcor, the colour black often gets misunderstood. Yet, far from being moody or gothic in nature, the palermo (blackout) black makes a wonderful complementary accent to other, brighter shades, whilst still retaining the brilliant practicality that is so typical of the palermo range. Accent bold brights in the kitchen, such as yellows or limes, with the darkness of the black, or set up a wholly monochromatic scheme in the home office by teaming with pure, bright whites and pale dove greys, letting the blind be your room's dominant feature.
